body_html:
@tedhtchang @drpngx it does look like this may be too restrictive. The inception_v2 checkpoint is a v1 checkpoint, and that should be read automatically without raising an error.

On other words, we cannot assume that we read only v2 checkpoints just because we want to write only v2 checkpoints. Removing the check in saver.py should be enough to fix this, the other changes are still good (I think)

@av8ramit I think this will require a cherry-pick for 1.6 to fix the backwards incompatible change in behavior.
